author: The Telegraph
title: Win a Cotswolds short break and a day at the races
text: Fancy a short break in a five-star country-house hotel in the beautiful Cotswolds, accompanied by a great day out at Cheltenham Racecourse? The Telegraph has partenered with Essilor to put together a fantastic prize package – ideal for enthusiasts of the turf and country living alike – centred on a two-night stay in the fabulous Ellenborough Park Hotel, Cheltenham. The prize features two nights' accommodation for two in a deluxe room on a bed-and-breakfast basis, plus two hospitality tickets in the Final Fence Restaurant at Cheltenham Racecourse for Countryside Day on November 13, 2015. Relax in the lap of luxury at Ellenborough Park The hospitality package includes: Club admission ticket One car parking space Official racecard Morning coffee and biscuits on arrival Four-course lunch Light afternoon tea TV racing coverage throughout the day Tote betting service Services of the on-site hospitality team Countryside classics: the day features top racing and displays of country pursuits Photo: Getty The winner will also win a complete pair of spectacles, with Essilor Crizal UV Protective Lenses and frames with a retail value of up to £200, to be arranged with an independent optician in the locality of the winner’s home. All you have to do to be in with a chance of snagging this great prize is enter your details in the form below by Sunday 1 November, 2015.
